0100010011111100 1000000010011000 1 -> sum: 1100010110010101, cout: 0
1001100100101101 0100001110111101 1 -> sum: 1101110011101011, cout: 0
0010100101111111 1110000111110011 1 -> sum: 0000101101110011, cout: 1
1100001111101000 0001101010001110 1 -> sum: 1101111001110111, cout: 0
1000011101011000 1110110101100111 0 -> sum: 0111010010111111, cout: 1
0100110001110001 0011111100001000 1 -> sum: 1000101101111010, cout: 0
